original_text:
Maya
Il tema di Maya è abbastanza chiaro in questa slot gratis di Red Rake del 2018 intitolata  Maya. Il design curato e la grafica che riprende immagini di di piramidi, sacerdoti, idoli d’oro, ceramiche e statue tradizionali di questa antichissima civiltà.
Gameplay del gioco
Questa slot senza scaricare presenta 5 rulli con 50 linee attive che faranno parte dell’azione di ogni round. Avrai accesso a giri gratuiti con simboli enormi, a una funzionalità Maya d’oro e a jackpot fissi, quindi almeno 3 motivi validi per provare il gioco!
Scommesse e premi principali
La scommessa viene decisa tramite l’opzione Puntata totale, che vedrai in basso, vicino al centro di quella fila di opzioni. Inizi da un minimo di 0,50€ e decidi tu di quanto aumentare il valore della giocata. I premi in media sono soddisfacenti, anche se la mia attenzione si è fermata sui jackpot Grand, Major e Minor che regalano da 50x a 1.500x la puntata per giro.
Simbologia antica Maya e funzioni speciali

I rulli 1, 3 e 5 possono contenere speciali simboli Bonus Piramide, che ti serviranno su tutti e tre per ottenere la funzione extra. In questo modo vinci 6 giri gratis e per la loro durata ci sarà la possibilità di far atterrare sui rulli MAXI simboli 3×3 occupando tutte le posizioni sui tre rulli centrali. Se atterrano, ti danno anche 3 giri gratuiti extra!
Sono presenti anche simboli jolly che prendano la forma di sacerdoti Maya. Questi sono i sostituti che stai aspettando in ogni partita se atterrano nel posto giusto;
L’icona Huge Coin, se appare durante i giochi gratuiti, avvierà una funzionalità chiamata Mayans Gold. Aggiungerà 3 giri gratuiti al totale e bloccherà le monete d’oro nella loro posizione. Una volta esauriti i giri gratuiti o quando si riempiono le ruote di monete, la funzione termina;
La funzione Maya d’oro è la più importante e può attivare uno dei tre jackpot fissi. Le monete che appaiono sui rulli riveleranno i premi delle monete o il logo dei jackpot.

Che idea mi sono fatta su questa slot gratis?
La slot online Maya può essere un gioco davvero divertente, con diversi jackpot da attivare e interessanti giri gratuiti, oltre alla grafica ben realizzata che rende il gioco molto piacevole. Se ami il tema Maya ti suggerisco un giro di prova in demo selezionando la slot direttamente dalla nostra libreria virtuale.

raw_translation.response:
Maya

The theme of Maya is quite clear in this 2018 Red Rake free slot called Maya. The carefully crafted design and graphics take inspiration from images of pyramids, priests, golden idols, ceramics, and traditional statues of this ancient civilization.

Gameplay

This no download slot features 5 reels with 50 active paylines that will be part of each round's action. You'll have access to free spins with huge symbols, a Golden Maya feature, and fixed jackpots, at least three good reasons to try the game!

Betting and Major Prizes

The bet is decided through the Total Bet option that you will see at the bottom, near the center of that row of options. You start from a minimum of 0.50€ and decide how much to increase the value of the stake. The prizes, on average, are satisfying, although my attention was drawn to the Grand, Major, and Minor jackpots, which offer from 50x to 1,500x the stake per spin.

Ancient Maya symbols and special functions

Reels 1, 3, and 5 may contain special Pyramid Bonus symbols that you will need on all three to get the extra function. This way, you win 6 free spins, and during their duration, there will be a chance to land MAXI 3×3 symbols on the reels occupying all positions on the three central reels. If they land, you also get 3 extra free spins!
There are also wild symbols that take the form of Maya priests. These are the substitutes you're waiting for in every game if they land in the right spot.
The Huge Coin icon, if it appears during the free games, will start a feature called Mayans Gold. It will add 3 free spins to the total and lock the gold coins in their position. Once the free spins are exhausted or when the reels are filled with coins, the feature ends.
The Golden Maya feature is the most important and can activate one of the three fixed jackpots. The coins that appear on the reels will reveal the prizes of the coins or the jackpot logo.

What impression did I get from this free slot game?

The online slot game Maya can be a really fun game, with several jackpots to activate and interesting free spins, in addition to the well-made graphics that make the game very enjoyable. If you love the Maya theme, I suggest giving it a try in demo mode by selecting the slot directly from our virtual library.

Review:
 
Maya Slot Game Overview

Maya is a free online slot game released in 2018 by Red Rake and based on the ancient Maya civilization. The game features 5 reels with 50 active paylines and offers free spins, a Golden Maya feature, and fixed jackpots.

Game Features and Symbols

Maya features symbols inspired by the ancient Maya civilization, such as pyramids, priests, golden idols, ceramics, and traditional statues. The three central reels may also contain huge symbols that occupy all positions and offer 3 extra free spins. Wild symbols in the form of Maya priests offer substitution, while the Huge Coin icon starts a feature called Mayans Gold that adds 3 free spins and locks the gold coins in their position. The Golden Maya feature can activate one of the three fixed jackpots whenever a jackpot logo appears on the reels.

Betting Options

Players can select their bet size through the Total Bet option located near the center of the row of options at the bottom of the game. The minimum bet is 0.50€, and players can increase the value of the stake according to their preferences. The prizes are satisfying, with the Grand, Major, and Minor jackpots offering from 50x to 1,500x the stake per spin.

Golden Maya Feature and Fixed Jackpots

The Golden Maya feature is the most important feature of Maya, as it can activate one of the three fixed jackpots. The Golden Maya feature is triggered whenever a jackpot logo appears on the reels, and the coins that appear on the reels will reveal the prizes of the coins or the jackpot logo. The Grand, Major, and Minor jackpots offer from 50x to 1,500x the stake per spin and can be won through the Golden Maya feature.

Graphics and Demo Mode Availability

Maya features carefully crafted design and graphics inspired by the ancient Maya civilization, with symbols such as pyramids, priests, golden idols, ceramics, and traditional statues. The game is available in demo mode, and players can try it for free by selecting the slot directly from Red Rake's virtual library.
